00010 FileInputSpikeDriver::FileInputSpikeDriver(const char * NewFileName) throw (EDLUTException): FileName(NewFileName), Currentline(1L){
00011         this->Finished = false;
00012         this->Handler = fopen(NewFileName,"rt");
00013         if (!this->Handler){
00014                 throw EDLUTException(6,20,13,0);
00015         }
00016 }

00022 void FileInputSpikeDriver::LoadInputs(EventQueue * Queue, Network * Net) throw (EDLUTFileException){
00023         if (this->Handler){
00024                 int ninputs,i,ret;
00025                 skip_comments(this->Handler,Currentline);
00026                 if(fscanf(this->Handler,"%i",&ninputs)==1){
00027                         int nspikes,nneuron,nreps,ineuron,itime;
00028                         float time,interv;
00029                         ret=0;
00030                         
00031                         for(i=0;i<ninputs;){
00032                                 skip_comments(this->Handler,Currentline);
00033                                 if(fscanf(this->Handler,"%f",&time)==1 && fscanf(this->Handler,"%i",&nspikes)==1 && fscanf(this->Handler,"%f",&interv)==1 && fscanf(this->Handler,"%i",&nneuron)==1 && fscanf(this->Handler,"%i",&nreps)==1){
00034                                         if(nneuron+nreps<=Net->GetNeuronNumber() && nneuron >= 0){
00035                                                 i+=nspikes*nreps;
00036                                                 
00037                                                 if(i<=ninputs){
00038                                                         for(itime=0;itime<nspikes;itime++){
00039                                                                 for(ineuron=0;ineuron<nreps;ineuron++){
00040                                                                         InputSpike * ispike = new InputSpike(time+itime*interv, Net->GetNeuronAt(nneuron+ineuron));
00041                                                                         
00042                                                                         Queue->InsertEvent(ispike);
00043                                                                 }
00044                                                         }
00045                                                 }else{
00046                                                         throw EDLUTFileException(6,16,15,1,Currentline);
00047                                                 }
00048                                         }else{
00049                                                 throw EDLUTFileException(6,17,16,1,Currentline);
00050                                                 break;
00051                                         }
00052                                 }else{
00053                                         throw EDLUTFileException(6,18,17,1,Currentline);
00054                                         break;
00055                                 }
00056                         }                       
00057                 }else{
00058                         throw EDLUTFileException(6,19,18,1,Currentline);
00059                 }               
00060
